entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
